EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-05-30-Echostor Dine and Dash Send.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Join EchoStor and Turbonomic for Dinner with a Side of Automation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://echostor.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/Turbo_Dine-n_Dash_Event_Email.html]]> {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, After a long day of work wouldn't it be nice to automate the process of cooking and cleaning up from dinner? While we here at Turbonomic can automate a lot of actions, dinner is not one of them. That being said, we can offer you the next best thing. Come join EchoStor and Turbonomic <[[https://echostor.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/Turbo_Dine-n_Dash_Event_Email.html]]> at Maggiano's for drinks and appetizersÂ as we discuss how to deliver better applications faster regardless of cloud, infrastructure or architecture. After our brief session we will send you home with a dinner for four from one of the best Italian restaurants in all of Boston!
- Host: EchoStor and Turbonomic - When: Wednesday June, 7th 2017, 7PM - Where: Maggianos's Little Italy - Address: 4 Columbus Ave, Boston, MA 02116
RSVP Here <[[https://echostor.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/Turbo_Dine-n_Dash_Event_Email.html]]>.
Please reach out to Grace.Murphy@Turbonomic.com or your account executives for any further questions.
Best,
Your friends at Turbonomic
